content: After a day of taking on San Francisco like a local, Stanford Court offers a hilltop haven and delighful blend of escape & access. Our elevated vantage point atop Nob Hill provides exterior rooms with sweeping views of this picturesque city. The intersection of the city's cable car lines connects guests to the best the city has to offer. In the spirit of connectivity, all of our rooms are equipped with high-speed, reliable WiFi along with several more standout amenities.
